Here is the list of zodiac signs and their scores based on the $line concept:
1. Aries - 6/10 - Focused, driven, but prone to impulsive decisions.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Practical, reliable, but can be stubbornly resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted, adaptable, but may struggle with commitment.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Nurturing, emotional, but can be overly sensitive and clingy.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident, charismatic, but may struggle with humility and ego.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical, practical, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 7/10 - Diplomatic, social, but may prioritize harmony over authenticity.
8. Scorpio - 5/10 - Passionate, intense, but can be overly secretive and controlling.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous, optimistic, but may struggle with impatience and recklessness.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Disciplined, responsible, but may prioritize duty over personal fulfillment.
11. Aquarius - 7/10 - Humanitarian, independent, but may struggle with emotional detachment.
12. Pisces - 8/10 - Empathetic, imaginative, but may struggle with boundaries and reality-checking.
Note: The scores are based on the general energies associated with each sign's planetary ruler(s) and their corresponding themes in astrology.
